subject: Track and Field
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: Amantle Montsho of Botswana, a world champion at 400 meters, leads a focused, austere life at a training facility in Dakar, Senegal, 3,600 miles from her home.
snippet: Amantle Montsho of Botswana, a world champion at 400 meters, leads a focused, austere life at a training facility in Dakar, Senegal, 3,600 miles from her home.
